mapper.select: select id, role_id, resources_id, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, is_delete from personnel_manage.sys_role_resources_rel where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into personnel_manage.sys_role_resources_rel(role_id, resources_id, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, is_delete) values (#{roleId}, #{resourcesId}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyUser}, #{isDelete})
mapper.update:
update personnel_manage.sys_role_resources_rel
role_id = #{roleId},
resources_id = #{resourcesId},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
modify_user = #{modifyUser},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
